word_mean: 原肠胚：囊胚泡以后的早期胚胎，最简单型包括两层，外胚层和中内胚层，以及两个腔，一个位于外胚层和内胚层之间，另一个(原肠)由内陷形成，因而位于内胚层内，并有一个开口(胚孔)

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek gastēr, gastr- 'stomach' + the Latin diminutive ending -ula

means.word_mean: 1. double-walled stage of the embryo resulting from invagination of the blastula; the outer layer of cells is the ectoderm and the inner layer differentiates into the mesoderm and endoderm
